description: Apples are round, crisp fruits with a thin skin that can be red, green, or yellow. They have sweet, juicy flesh and are one of the most widely cultivated tree fruits worldwide. The flesh surrounds a core containing small seeds.

flavor_profile.notes: Sweet and crisp with subtle tartness

season: Late summer to early winter (August-December in most regions)
storage_tips: Store in a cool, dry place or refrigerate for up to 2 months. Keep away from strong-smelling foods as apples can absorb odors. Handle gently to avoid bruising.
preparation: Wash thoroughly before eating. Can be eaten with or without skin. For jams, peel if desired and slice the flesh, discarding the core. The high pectin content makes excellent jams with good gel formation.
